title: Ep. 82 - Horror Stories
description:
On today's show, the guys play a couple of social media word games that have been going viral on Twitter, they talk about the war the USGA has waged against Pat and how he will not go quietly into the night when it comes to fighting this atrocity. Zito also attempts to spell coup (with poor results), they catch up with what's happening in the world including Babe Ruth's jersey being sold at auction for over $5 million, they discuss Jim Kong's latest execution techniques, the escape artist/magician from India that isn't good at his job, storm chasin' season, the big fuss around rage rooms, they discuss the Pat McAfee Does America Tour, and much, much more. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
